text:
Hey <@U01DC2USL66>  I have a Notion System Built Just for in house Content Production Pipelines.



From Keyword Research , to Content Briefs, Writing and Optimization.


There are separate systems that are built for voice of customer and audience research too.

Everything ties together in an operations and sprint area.

Think you might be a good fit.

I can spin up a quick loom video, just let me know.
